Name: Blue Bird
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A blue-rinsed, orange washed, gin-based cocktail that benefits from being sweetened with almond rather than plain syrup.
History: Thought to have been created in the late 1950s in Montmartre, Paris, France.
Nutrition: One serving of Blue Bird contains 184 calories
